messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1423
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/8/01 2:48:56 PM US Mountain Standard Time, ... Nicki:  I m living in the US, but a citizen of both countries.... If the lifestyle here
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/8/01 2:48:56 PM US Mountain Standard Time,
RValvo7626@... writes:


> Whether
> people like the way I write or not, is not my concern... It's important
> that
> I say what I need to say... >>
>
> I like this Dawn. I think if I said what I wanted more often on this
> computer it may just help me IRL. I am such a scaredy cat. OK just jump in
> the pool no wading.;o)
>
> Also I can't remember,are you in the US now or are you in Britain
> somewhere?
>
> NICKI~ obey struck a nerve here too
>

Nicki: I'm living in the US, but a citizen of both countries.... If the
lifestyle here stops suiting us, then we'll go back to England.

Dawn

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1423
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/7/01 10:20:03 PM Mountain Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/7/01 10:20:03 PM Mountain Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< A word of warning to all on this unschooling list, I can be very direct,
to
the point, some may think downright rude and inpolite. So when a subject
catches my attention I'm going to be very outspoken about it.... Whether
people like the way I write or not, is not my concern... It's important that
I say what I need to say... >>

I like this Dawn. I think if I said what I wanted more often on this
computer it may just help me IRL. I am such a scaredy cat. OK just jump in
the pool no wading.;o)

Also I can't remember,are you in the US now or are you in Britain
somewhere?

NICKI~ obey struck a nerve here too

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1423
messages.msgSnippet: www.unschooling.com The forum, no the subsidiary mailing list. That s where support and advice and debate are best found.
messages.messageBody:
www.unschooling.com
The forum, no the subsidiary mailing list.

That's where support and advice and debate are best found.
<<
I joined this list looking for adult conversation, support, advice and
debate in an area I care very much about and want to learn more about. If I
want to hear name-calling, back biting, and arguing I can get plenty of that
with my small children who I know and love enough to put up with it until
they learn better. I think I'll look for my advice elsewhere.
>>


www.unschooling.com


Sandra

"Everything counts."
http://expage.com/SandraDoddArticles
http://expage.com/SandraDodd

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1423
messages.msgSnippet: I joined this list looking for adult conversation, support, advice and debate in an area I care very much about and want to learn more about. If I want to hear
messages.messageBody:
I joined this list looking for adult conversation, support, advice and
debate in an area I care very much about and want to learn more about. If I
want to hear name-calling, back biting, and arguing I can get plenty of that
with my small children who I know and love enough to put up with it until
they learn better. I think I'll look for my advice elsewhere.

_________________________________________________________________
